name: IslamicMorningPrayers-AzkarAlsabah
0:
”Alexa, open islamic morning prayers”
”Alexa, start islamic morning prayers”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: islamic morning prayers
des: Enhance your mornings with the soothing recitations of Azkar Al-Sabah, the Islamic morning supplications that bring peace, blessings, and divine protection to your day. This Alexa skill offers you a simple and convenient way to listen to these powerful invocations, allowing you to start your day with spiritual mindfulness and a deep connection to your faith. Whether you're at home, on the go, or preparing for your daily activities, let the calming words of Azkar Al-Sabah guide and protect you from dawn until dusk. This skill runs in Arabic.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
